thread.title: Cutest Police Dog In Training Is One Fast Learner

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Cutest Police Dog In Training Is One Fast Learner
text:
Cutest Police Dog In Training Is One Fast Learner Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! 
Do you know how police train detection, or “sniffer” dogs? Meet Maverick. The adorable puppy is already impressing his trainers with what a fast learner he is. 
Watch the future K9 in action as he sniffs out heroin among the different smells. I love how he gets so much positive reinforcement. This is just one of his training exercises, and his trainers say he’s already able to target all five major odors by eight weeks old! 
Share this cute pup with your friends and family. Subscribe to Reshareworthy! It's FREE and always will be! Like Us On Facebook! Reshareworthy Must See Stories
